title: My site updates
content:
Again, I got my site back
Yay! I celerbrated with over 50 ounces of soda [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dexter.gif[/img]

Anyway,
[url=http://greenftechn.com/brandon]CLICK IT! It would make your mama SO proud![/url]

I got a pettion about MY site?! Yeah, it was wierd. They demanded I update my "List -o- Sites" And get rid of all that Java [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-oops.gif[/img] ___________________________________________
[url=http://greenftechn.com/brandon]greenftechn.com/brandon[/url]

title: Re: My site updates
content:
Yes, you really should get rid of the Java rollovers. CSS does the exact same job better (and in many more browsers; not everyone has Java, you know). I know Frontpage 2000 does Java rollovers by default, but I can't figure out why - surely they had Javascript to do that back when it was released, if not basic CSS support.
[url=http://toxicsheep.com]toxicsheep.com[/url] | [url=http://commanderkeen.org]coming up next...[/url] | 2 pence an hour for godawful tech support job... [url=http://www.jobsite.co.uk/cgi-bin/vacdetails.pl?selection=915675807]yes please![/url]

title: Re: My site updates
content:
Yeah, get rid of the Java, Java sucks and it's gargin' slow to use this way.. Plus, your site would load 10x faster if you had CSS instead of Java. And as grafix said, many don't bother installing Java.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: My site updates
content:
I agree on the Java thing. It always makes me wait.

Well, pretty neat site. Not too bad. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] ___________________
DaVince, Yet Another Amateur Game Creator! :P

title: Re: My site updates
content:
One thing is, Front Page is a coding tool,

[img]http://greenftechn.com/brandon/images/FrontageSS1.gif[/img]

So if I try something else, its a good deal of work. It will automaticly go to Java if I dont set it, and that takes a while! But I did it...

It's just good to have my server back!

P.S. another change! I am archiving my news!___________________________________________
